flawed_nl_solution:
The number of non-valuable files Brennan downloaded in the first round is 70/100*800 = <<70/100*800=8000/7>>8000/7 files.
The number of valuable files Brennan downloaded in the first round is 800-8000/7 = <<800-8000/7=-2400/7>>-2400/7
When he downloaded 400 new files, there were 3/5*400= <<3/5*400=240>>240 non-useful files, which he deleted again.
The total number of valuable files he downloaded in the second round is 400-240 = <<400-240=160>>160
To write his research, Brennan had 160+-2400/7 = <<160+-2400/7=-1280/7>>-1280/7 useful files to reference to write his research.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 560, not 8000/7. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
